attributes.action: Home visits for those that are mentally ill but may not attend appointments
attributes.additional_details: My dad was mentally ill. I feel he was failed by the system and it killed him in the end. He was sent appointments but due to his mental illness and no help he didn't attend his appointments and so was abandoned. People with any type of mental illness need more recognition. If people don't attend their mental health appointments send someone round to check on the situation. Do home visits. The reason for their non attendance could be their illness. Don't ignore it!
